pages.text: When you die, your $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/corpse)corpse$() will be left behind with all your $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/corpse-x-curios-api-compat)items$(). You can loot it by right clicking it. Corpses will turn into skeletons after awhile and eventually decay.
